headline: AMAT Stock Rises 114% From Its 52-Week Low: Time to Hold or Fold?
summary: Applied Materials is up 114% from its 52-week low as AI-driven wafer fab demand boosts growth, but export limits, competition and valuation raise the hold-or-sell question.

raw.headline: AMAT Stock Rises 114% From Its 52-Week Low: Time to Hold or Fold?

headline: Stocks Are Inching Higher
summary: The stock market was grinding higher in Tuesday morning trading. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 46 points, or 0.1%. The S&P 500 was up 0.2%. The Nasdaq Composite was up 0.2%. The yield on the 2-year Treasury note was up to 3.

headline: Is Lam Research (LRCX) Still Attractive After A 153% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Lam Research is still good value after its strong run, you will want to look past the headlines and focus on what the current price really implies. The stock last closed at US$194.76, with returns of 12.1% over 7 days, 22.7% over 30 days, 5.2% year to date and 153.5% over the past year, so many holders are already sitting on sizeable gains. Recent attention on semiconductor equipment makers like Lam Research has been closely linked to market interest...
